data.name: Sugarcreek
data.detailed_description: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie, a high-school goat with a navy blue jacket and a missing stepsister. Joined by his closest friends, Felix the fox, Darby the cat, and Charlotte the rat, Eddie must search the town of Sugarcreek, Washington to find his stepsister Hazel before the week is over! Along the way, you'll meet plenty of interesting characters, play minigames based on story moments, participate in tile-based battles, and learn more about Eddie and his friends as they're faced with tough challenges and difficult realizations while navigating their lives as teenagers.
data.about_the_game: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie, a high-school goat with a navy blue jacket and a missing stepsister. Joined by his closest friends, Felix the fox, Darby the cat, and Charlotte the rat, Eddie must search the town of Sugarcreek, Washington to find his stepsister Hazel before the week is over! Along the way, you'll meet plenty of interesting characters, play minigames based on story moments, participate in tile-based battles, and learn more about Eddie and his friends as they're faced with tough challenges and difficult realizations while navigating their lives as teenagers.
data.short_description: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie the high-school goat and his closest friends as they try to find his missing stepsister before the week is over!
